TI: The secret is at the crossways: hodotopic organization and nonlinear dynamics of brain neural networks.
AB: By integrating the classic psychological principles of ancient art of memory (AAOM) with the most recent paradigms in cognitive neuroscience (i.e., the concepts of hodotopic organization and nonlinear dynamics of brain neural networks), Llewellyn provides an up-to-date model of the complex psychological relationships between memory, imagination, and dreams in accordance with current state-of-the-art principles in neuroscience.
AD: Interdisciplinary Group for Research in Neuroscience, Epistemology and Cognition, Neurological Department, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH 43210. tobias.mattei@osumc.edu.
